data.message: Yes! Now if i could just get Each of you to donate 1 and or more US $'s to the F.A.F. (Fix America Foundation) I just started. Would be due-ly appreciated by all to whom would reep your generosity. My donation is my time on two wheels to drop your $'s off at the appropriate locations. Just 1 meaningful thing i can do before i tip over. Please send your donate to Love it Bob! 428 N 33 Rd Cadillac Mi. 49601. PS: It might just make your own journey through life a fuzz easier. Its just a baby step at this point. God speed and i wish all who get this the best!!! :)
